trans-unit.target: 当你从你手上施放此咒语时，如果你操控神器则复制之，然后如果你操控结界则复制之。你可以为每个复制品选择新的目标。
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: ELD·325 | Banish into Fable | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. You create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 将目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。你派出一个2/2白色，具警戒异能的骑士衍生生物。
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: ELD·326 | Chulane, Teller of Tales | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: ELD·326 | Chulane, Teller of Tales | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: ELD·326 | Chulane, Teller of Tales | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放生物咒语时，抓一张牌，然后你可以将一张地牌从你手上放进战场。
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: ELD·326 | Chulane, Teller of Tales | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}：将目标由你操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。
trans-unit.note: 中文翻译出现在发布释疑中

trans-unit.resname: ELD·327 | Gluttonous Troll | Card Name
ELD·327 | Gluttonous Troll | Card Text | Paragraph 1
ELD·327 | Gluttonous Troll | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a number of Food tokens equal to the number of opponents you have. (Food tokens are artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出若干食品衍生物，其数量等同于你的对手数量。（食品衍生物是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: ELD·327 | Gluttonous Troll | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {1}{G}, Sacrifice another nonland permanent: CARDNAME gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {1}{G}，牺牲另一个非地永久物：CARDNAME得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: ELD·328 | Knights' Charge | Card Name
ELD·328 | Knights' Charge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Knight you control attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的骑士攻击时，每位对手各失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: ELD·328 | Knights' Charge | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {6}{W}{B}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Return all Knight creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: {6}{W}{B}，牺牲CARDNAME：将所有骑士生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。
